Record.ClassificationPath: Skin and Connective Tissue Diseases/Skin Diseases/Skin Diseases, Metabolic/Lipodystrophy/Lipodystrophy, Familial Partial
Nutritional and Metabolic Diseases/Metabolic Diseases/Lipid Metabolism Disorders/Lipodystrophy/Lipodystrophy, Familial Partial
Nutritional and Metabolic Diseases/Metabolic Diseases/Skin Diseases, Metabolic/Lipodystrophy/Lipodystrophy, Familial Partial
Record.Description: Inherited conditions characterized by the partial loss of ADIPOSE TISSUE, either confined to the extremities with normal or increased fat deposits on the face, neck and trunk (type 1), or confined to the loss of SUBCUTANEOUS FAT from the limbs and trunk (type 2).This type can be caused by mutation in the gene encoding LAMIN TYPE A.This type can be caused by mutation in the gene encoding PEROXISOME PROLIFERATOR-ACTIVATED RECEPTOR GAMMA.
